Description: Three fragments from a large furnishing textile, mainly palin undyed linen but with a deep decorated border at the top and bottom - brocaded decoration in blue linen, and red green and orange wool. Decoration with crosses, lozenges, and small animal and plant motifs. Fragments 1 and 2 retain selvedges, 2 has part of a lower fringe, 3 has part of an upper fringe.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), T11 B2 Grave 4
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
